column3: Latest;Svay Rieng province: A robbery occurred on December 29
column8: Svay Rieng province.------At least 130 mobile phones were taken by unidentified robbers who entered the store by cutting a hole in the roof.------The  owner of the shop called Sam Chan
column10: including Oppos and iPhones.------Police are examining CCTV footage in a bid to catch the culprits. ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/281927
